The cold stare of Meteara met Firaxis. He was clearly a Cybertronian, 
and she would have to destroy him if he did anything against her.

Meteara: I am Meteara, Emissary of the Vok. You are a cybertronian. I 
warn you that any offense from your part will result in your death. I 
stand here until your kind disturbs the Vok one more time.

She looked at the Earth, so round and blue in the distance. If need 
be, she would terminate the Vector, but the situation was not that bad 
yet.

Meteara: Now, speak your business or go.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Firaxis::
>        He gulps and stares back at her.  Finally working up a little 
courage 
> he calls out.  "Hi there.  You must be new here too."
